description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0925 ( Phlebotomy Issue)
name: v2 Phlebotomy Issue

text.div:
Phlebotomy Issue

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
acn Air Contaminationadded v2.8
clt Clottedadded v2.8
col Collapseadded v2.8
dak Defective Apheresis Kitadded v2.8
dbg Defective Bagadded v2.8
dmt Defective Instrumentadded v2.8
dnd Defective Needleadded v2.8
inf Infiltrationadded v2.8
ipf Instrument Power Failureadded v2.8
mis Missed / in tissueadded v2.8
nad Needle adjustment (this may not end a procedure, if successful will impact component production)added v2.8
pfl Poor flowadded v2.8
vsm Vein Spasmadded v2.8
